summary.para: Contains encoding statistics from the Digital Living Network Alliance (DLNA) media sink.
This structure is used with the MF_MP2DLNA_STATISTICS attribute.

member.name: MFMPEG2DLNASINKSTATS.cBytesWritten
member.summary: Total number of bytes written to the byte stream.

member.name: MFMPEG2DLNASINKSTATS.fPAL
member.summary: If TRUE, the video stream is a PAL format. Otherwise, the video stream is an NTSC format.

member.name: MFMPEG2DLNASINKSTATS.fccVideo
member.summary: A FOURCC code that specifies the video format.

member.name: MFMPEG2DLNASINKSTATS.dwVideoWidth
member.summary: The width of the video frame, in pixels.

member.name: MFMPEG2DLNASINKSTATS.dwVideoHeight
member.summary: The height of the video frame, in pixels.

member.name: MFMPEG2DLNASINKSTATS.cVideoFramesReceived
member.summary: The number of video frames received.

member.name: MFMPEG2DLNASINKSTATS.cVideoFramesEncoded
member.summary: The number of video frames that have been encoded.

member.name: MFMPEG2DLNASINKSTATS.cVideoFramesSkipped
member.summary: The number of video frames that have been skipped.

member.name: MFMPEG2DLNASINKSTATS.cBlackVideoFramesEncoded
member.summary: The number of black frames that have been encoded.

member.name: MFMPEG2DLNASINKSTATS.cVideoFramesDuplicated
member.summary: The number of duplicated video frames.

member.name: MFMPEG2DLNASINKSTATS.cAudioSamplesPerSec
member.summary: The audio sample rate, in samples per second.

member.name: MFMPEG2DLNASINKSTATS.cAudioBytesReceived
member.summary: The total amount of audio data received, in bytes.

member.name: MFMPEG2DLNASINKSTATS.cAudioFramesEncoded
member.summary: The number of audio frames that have been encoded.
